loginMsg: Hello, you are in the test version of Studybuddy, would you like to help us by becoming a tester?
longAway: Did you forget a running timer!
continue: Do you want to continue it?
shortBreak: Breaks shorter than 5 seconds are not displayed

pause.pomoDone: You have completed your study session
pause.pomoDoneBad: You have completed your study session
pause.goodjobShort: Ok, that was a test. Go back to the home page to start studying for real.
pause.goodjobBad: Good job, but you can do better next time!

timer.freeMode: Study and have breaks as you want
timer.stopFirst: To modify the timer properties you must stop it first.

zen.confirm: Are you sure you want to end the session?

study.name: Name {element}
study.introMessage: Hey there, you just discovered the planning mode! It's still a work in progress but you can already add your exams and chapters. Click on the first exam on the left column to discover more. Click on the little arrow below to go back to the timer.

info.welcome: Hi! Press play to start a default session of 2 hours with 3 breaks of 5 minutes each. After you press play, the only thing you have to do is mantain focus until it's time for the first break. Happy studying!
info.pause: When you are on a break inside a studying session, try not to use your phone, expecially avoid social media. Instead rest your eyes, drink water or go to the restroom. Use this time to allow your brain to rework what you just studied.
info.timer: 2 different ways to track your time. Free: you decide when it's time for a break. Classic: you decide the intervals in advance and then execute them. Doesn't matter if you overshoot. You can use the classic Pomodoro intervals or create new ones.
info.theme: Here you can choose your favorite theme. You can also create one from scratch adding a picture from the web.
info.feedback: If you have any suggestion or you want to report a bug, you can do it here. Thank you!
info.setup: Choose the type of timer you want to use, you can create new ones in the settings. If you want, add the exam you are about to study, enter a title and objectives or tasks for this study session. Select whether it will be a moment of deep work (concentration) or shallow work (light work). When you're ready, press play and start studying!
info.snake: The snake represents your study session. The apple represents a break. When you reach it, you can decide if you want to take a break or continue studying. You can pause at any time by pressing the pause button. You can adjust the number and duration of the breaks from the set
info.snakePause: The apple represents a break. When you reach it, you can decide if you want to take a break or continue studying. You can pause at any time by pressing the pause button. You can adjust the number and duration of the breaks from the settings.

history.loginMsg: Log in to track your progress and for a customized experience
history.noHistory: You have not yet completed a study session of at least 5 minutes
